meanings.definition: Not easily upset or excited; calm and composed.
meanings.sent1: She remained unflappable during the storm, showing no signs of fear.
meanings.sent2: The unflappable teacher handled the noisy classroom with ease.
meanings.sent3: Even when the prankster tried to scare her, she stayed unflappable.
meanings.sent4: His unflappable demeanor in the face of danger was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The unflappable pilot landed the plane smoothly despite the turbulence.

meanings.definition: Remaining composed and level-headed in difficult situations.
meanings.sent1: The unflappable firefighter rescued the cat from the burning building.
meanings.sent2: She proved to be unflappable under pressure during the important presentation.
meanings.sent3: His unflappable attitude even in chaos made everyone trust his leadership.
meanings.sent4: The unflappable detective solved the case with ease, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent5: In the face of adversity, her unflappable nature inspired those around her.
